list.abs: how would you handle an abrasive captain or coworker ., 请问你会如何处理的磨料船长或同事.
Qescribe a time when you had to assist a coworker ., 请举出你帮助一位同事的例子.
keep antibacterial for werehing your hands , especially despite interacting with a sick coworker .勤用有抗生素的香皂洗手，尤其是接触过生病的同事之后。
once you settle disputes with coworkers ( and you will ) then you'll magnificently swing into work mode .一旦解决与同事的争端，你会很快投身到工作中。

entry.tran: (尤指同一工作或项目上的)同事，同僚
entry.def: Your co-workers are the people you work with, especially people on the same job or project as you.
